about_the_game: You will both build and gain new features with new buildings in the depths of space. You will open different regions thanks to the separate mission of each region. A different building will be waiting for a different new feature in each region. When all regions open, the planet will be completed and your journey to the new planet will begin. Each planet will have unique mechanics, features and buildings. Whether you just deal with resource management, earn money by selling resources by trading, or train soldiers and fight the coming dangers. There will be many different mechanics and varieties in the game and you will discover them all as you do and open the missions of the regions in your hands to discover them.
